document_data.mainbody:
Tren was a farmers son enslaved by the Cult of the Dragon in 1369 DR.
Tren was a homely but strong young man, with a muscular body of a farmer.
In 1369 DR, Tren was one of the unfortunate villagers captured by the Cult of the Dragons slavers. Alongside Wenta, Jorsh, and Ristim, the folk were taken to the Cults slave pens in the ruined Darnarests tower.
